    • populateStartMinutes

    • populateDurationHours

      public void populateDurationHours(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Fills the durationHrField comboBox after clearing durationHr and durationMin Fields. Factors in the startTime and closingTime of the business so that only viable duration hours are populated.

    • populateDurationMinutes

      public void populateDurationMinutes(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Fills the durationMinField comboBox after clearing durationMin Fields. Factors in the startTime and closingTime of the business so that only viable duration minutes are populated.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Button function that checks that all input fields are non-null and valid, then calls function to add appointment to database. Will show corresponding alerts if any fields are null and calls the function to confirm that there are no scheduling conflicts prior to adding to the database. *
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • returnToAppointments

      public void returnToAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Button function that redirects the user back to the 'appointments' page.
      Throws:
      IOException
